Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: フォグマ
Entry.EnglishText: Fogma

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: イーガ
Entry.EnglishText: Iger

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマ
Entry.EnglishText: Tohma

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: 副官
Entry.EnglishText: Lieutenant

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て！
Entry.EnglishText: Stop this!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、おまえたちは？ 邪魔をするな！
Entry.EnglishText: Who the hell do you think you are? Stay out of this!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな事をしても何にもならない！ 冷静に話し合いをしてはどうだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Nothing is going to come out of fighting. How about we calm down and talk things out?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのくせに、 ヒューマの味方をする気か？
Entry.EnglishText: You've got some nerve siding with the Huma when you're a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: どちらの味方もする気はない。 お互いを傷つけ合っても、 溝が深まるばかりで、 何の解決にもならん！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not taking anyone's side. Hurting each other is only going to widen the rift between you. It won't solve anything!

Entry.JapaneseText: 溝を埋める気などさらさらない。 ヒューマを根絶やしにしてしまえば、 溝などなくなるのだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, we have no intention of closing any rifts. Once we eradicate these Huma, then there won't be any rifts to worry about!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、何が根絶やしだ！ それはこっちの台詞だ！ やれるもんなら、やってみろ！ 我らが同胞が黙っておらんぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What do you mean "eradicate?!" That should be <Italic>our</Italic> line! If you think you can kill us, go ahead and try! My brethren and I won't go down quietly!

Entry.JapaneseText: 口先ばかりのヒューマなど 怖くもなんともない。 ……やってしまえ！
Entry.EnglishText: You think you Huma have us scared? You're nothing but talk! Let's finish this!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て！ やめろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, stop!

Entry.JapaneseText: きゃあ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Aaahh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたち、 いい加減にしなさいよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Knock it off, all of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: やめろォォォッ!! やめろって言ってんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: STOP! Just stop already!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト！
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust!

Entry.JapaneseText: サレとトーマもいるよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: And Saleh and Tohma are with him?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 族長二人を拘束し、 暴動を鎮圧せよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Arrest both leaders and put an end to this riot at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、どいた、どいた…… おとなしくしないと 痛い目に遭うよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, move along, move along... If you don't behave, then you're going to have a bad time.

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ奴らが正規軍と 共に行動を!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why are the two of them working alongside the Callegean Army?

Entry.JapaneseText: どけと言ったら、どけ！
Entry.EnglishText: He said move, so get moving!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Uah!!

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん、どこに落ちたい？
Entry.EnglishText: So granny, where would you like me to drop you?

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつら!!
Entry.EnglishText: Those bastards!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待て！ サレ、トーマ！
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh, Tohma! That's enough.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？ 僕たちは将軍閣下の 命令に従ってるだけだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why? Your excellency, we were only following your orders.

Entry.JapaneseText: いたずらに民間人を 傷つけるようなやり方は 認めていない。
Entry.EnglishText: I will not tolerate any actions that cause unnecessary harm to civilians.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん……きれいごとで、 争いが解決できるとでも 言うのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... So all that talk about stopping these conflicts was just lip service?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の命令は王国の意思だ。 命令違反が何を意味するのか、 わかっているのだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: My commands are the will of the Kingdom. I take it you understand what it means to go against my orders.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかったよ。 行こう、トーマ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Oh, fine. Let's go, Tohma.

Entry.JapaneseText: チッ……
Entry.EnglishText: Tch...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……大丈夫か？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたらの世話には ならないよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need sympathy from the likes of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 将軍！
Entry.EnglishText: General!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマの 両族長を拘束しました！
Entry.EnglishText: We have arrested both the Huma Chieftain and the Gajuma Chieftain!

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ今をもって、この街を カレギア軍の管轄下に置き、 すべてのヒューマとガジュマを 街の東西に分けて暮らすものとする。
Entry.EnglishText: This town is now under the complete jurisdiction of the Callegean Army. All Huma and Gajuma are to be separated so that they reside in their respective side of town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 全隊、一斉に行動開始!! 抵抗する者は実力をもって これを排除せよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: All soldiers are to commence operations at once. Any resistance must be dealt with by force!

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきの騒ぎが うそのようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: To think this place was in such an uproar not too long ago...

Entry.JapaneseText: あとは軍に任せて、 俺たちはハックに 話を聞きに行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's find Hack and talk with him, since the army is taking care of the rest.

Entry.JapaneseText: コケコッコー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Cock-a-doodle-doo!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 異種族に対する攻撃、 破壊活動、略奪行為が 絶え間なく行われている。
Entry.EnglishText: There's constant fighting, looting, and acts of vandalism between the races.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我々軍も必死で対応しているが、 手が足りないほどだ。 注意して行動するように。
Entry.EnglishText: While we try our best to keep the peace, we lack manpower. Stay vigilant.

Entry.JapaneseText: 住民による経済活動を 停止した。
Entry.EnglishText: All civilian economic activity has been halted.

Entry.JapaneseText: 商店の経営などは、 我が軍の管理下にある。
Entry.EnglishText: All mercantile activities are now managed by the millitary.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一見、平穏な感じを 受けるかもしれないが、 この街は非常に危険な状況にある。
Entry.EnglishText: While things seem peaceful on the surface, the situation in this town is very dangerous.

Entry.JapaneseText: 用がないのなら 退去するのが望ましい。
Entry.EnglishText: If you have no business here, then I suggest you leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: 王朝に関する、様々な ウワサが飛び交っているが、 どれもガセネタばかりだ。
Entry.EnglishText: There are many rumors being spread about the current royal court, but they're all lies.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下はご存命であられるし、 ジルバ様が種族主義をあおるような 演説をしたというのもウソだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty is still alive, and the rumors that Lady Zilva gave a speech espousing racism are also unfounded.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウワサに惑わされないように。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't fall for such gossip.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の争いに 巻き込まれないよう 十分注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: It is best to not get involved in interracial conflicts.

Entry.JapaneseText: 血迷った連中は、 旅行者であっても 関係ないからな。
Entry.EnglishText: These people won't care if you're just passing through. They're not acting rationally.
Entry.Notes: unclear if related to previous sentence.

Entry.JapaneseText: 昼間はまだましだが、 暗くなってからの外出は 本当に危険だ。
Entry.EnglishText: While it's not as bad during the daytime, when night comes around, things become really dangerous.

Entry.JapaneseText: 毎晩のように事件が発生している。 夜間の外出は絶対にしないように。
Entry.EnglishText: There are incidents every night. It's best to never be outside after dark.

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ様の演説のウワサが 流れているが、あれはデマだ。 耳を傾けないように。
Entry.EnglishText: There have been many rumors spreading since Lady Zilva gave her speech. None of them are true. It's best to ignore them.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、ラジルダは 戒厳令下にある。
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda is currently under martial law.

Entry.JapaneseText: 不必要に街中を うろうろする事は 控えるように。
Entry.EnglishText: Refrain from loitering in the streets.
You need medicine...?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街のガジュマの族長、 フォグマ様なら持ってる かもしれないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps the Gajuma Chief, Fogma, has some...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたたちヒューマなんか 相手するわけないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: I will not associate with you Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダの旗なら フォグマ様の命令で 燃やしちゃいましたよ。
Entry.EnglishText: By order of Chief Fogma, the flags of Razilda were burned.

Entry.JapaneseText: だってガジュマだけの旗が できたんですから、 必要ないでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: After all, we have no need for it any longer now that we have a Gajuma flag, wouldn't you say?

Entry.JapaneseText: うるさいねえ……旗？ 旗なんか、燃やしたわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: What a bother... You're asking about the flag? We burned them all.

Entry.JapaneseText: 花園がある場所ですか？ さあ……花が好きな人なら、 そういう事もわかるんでしょうけど……
Entry.EnglishText: A large flower garden? I reckon people who love flowers would know...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何よ…… このヒューマが……！ あっちへお行き！
Entry.EnglishText: What...a Huma! Get away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私もピピスタに行きたいわ…… ヒューマどもと暮らすのは もうゴメンだわ……
Entry.EnglishText: How I would love to go to Pipista... I can't stand living together with Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何よ…… このヒューマが……！ あっちへお行き！
Entry.EnglishText: What... You Huma! Get away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく……ヒューマは いつも厄介事しか 持ち込まないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Honestly, Huma bring nothing but trouble...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう……じゃまだよ！ 水が撒けないだろ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, I can't water the ground when you're in my way...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはガジュマ同士 助けあわねばなりません。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma must put Gajuma before all else.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんかあったら、 いつでも相談に乗りますよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you need anything, please let me know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ヒューマが うちの前を汚したわ！ 水を撒いて清めなきゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, you Huma just have to go kicking up dirt! Looks like I'm going to have to go cleanse the road again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 心を鎮める薬？ そんなの知らないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A drug to calm the mind? I don't know of such a thing.

Entry.JapaneseText: 知っててもヒューマには 教えないけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if I knew about it, I wouldn't tell a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: そういえば、ガジュマの旗と ヒューマの旗のふたつに 分かれたのよねー。
Entry.EnglishText: I remember the days when the Huma flag and the Gajuma flag were part of a greater whole...

Entry.JapaneseText: いい事だわ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those were the good ol' days...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマに話す事なんて ないわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have nothing to say to a Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: スイセンはガジュマの 花なんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Daffodils are a favorite flower among the Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも花屋がヒューマな ばっかりに欲しくても 手に入らないんです……
Entry.EnglishText: However, the florist is a Huma and refuses to sell them to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何よ…… このヒューマが……！
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Huma...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ…… ああ、この名の響き…… あんたも行くの？ あそこはいいわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, Pipista... I like the sound of that place... Are you going? It's wonderful there.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街からみて 南の荒野にある すてきな街よ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's a nice town located in the wasteland to the south.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何よ…… このヒューマが……！
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Huma...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの男がこそこそと 逃げまわって…… ドロボウでもしたのかしら……？
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a Huma male skulking about... Perhaps he was a thief?

Entry.JapaneseText: ハック？ ヒューマの事なんか、 いちいち覚えちゃいないよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for someone named Hack? As if I would remember every Huma I've ever met!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街で ヒューマと歩いてると 相手にされないわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: In this town no one will take you seriously if you associate with Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街じゃ どうか知らないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea about other cities, though...

Entry.JapaneseText: 親切で言って あげてるんだからね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm telling you this for your own good.

Entry.JapaneseText: しっしっ……じゃまだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Shoo! You're in my way!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
